articles.author: Rachel Hall
articles.title: Covid's effect on mental health not as great as first thought, study suggests - The Guardian
articles.description: Pandemic resulted in ‘minimal’ changes in symptoms, according to review led by McGill University researchers
articles.content:
Covid-19 may not have taken as great a toll on the mental health of most people as earlier research has indicated, a new study suggests.
